title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Tony: Has anyone ever thought as electricity demand goes up the price will also go up. My utility charges almost as much for their fixed costs (pay roll, maintenance...etc) as my actual electricity cost. If demand for electricity outpaces supply the prices will skyrocket and of course families need basic electricity just to live and heat their homes. Plus most State road taxes are derived from gasoline sales and the last thing a person needs is their taxes going up when maybe they are also using fossil fuels because the lack of plugins where parking is available. Nothing better than to plug in your vehicle but have somebody unplug it so they can use that plug and you are stranded at work because you do not have enough charge left to go home.
